author: rgerosa
body: New version of trackerDAQ which contains updates needed to commit in the cmssw SiStrip commissioning workflow (part of DQM) a new analysis identifying bad channels in the detector. The new spec file/ tarball package has been tested for slc6_amd64_gcc630 and slc7_amd64_gcc630.
title: updates of TrackerDAQ package (version 4.2)
